set:
(:action set_spy_group ; set up a spy group
      :parameters (?p - player ?c1 - co_conspirator ?sg - spy_group) 
      :precondition (and (not (in ?p ?sg)) (not (in ?c1 ?sg)))
      :effect (and (in ?p ?sg) (in ?c1 ?sg))
   )
talk:
(:action talk_in_private ; find a private place to talk and hold meetings
      :parameters (?p - player ?npc - non_player_character ?sg - spy_group)
      :precondition (and (in ?p ?sg) (in ?npc ?sg) (not (has_private_place ?sg)))
      :effect (and (has_private_place ?sg))
   )
gather:
(:action gather_gear ; gather essential spy gear
      :parameters (?p - player ?g - gear ?sg - spy_group)
      :precondition (and (in ?p ?sg) (not (has_gear ?sg ?g)))
      :effect (and (has_gear ?sg ?g))
   )

(:action gather_equipment ; gather additional spy equipment
      :parameters (?p - player ?e - equipment ?sg - spy_group)
      :precondition (and (in ?p ?sg) (not (has_equipment ?sg ?e)))
      :effect (and (has_equipment ?sg ?e))
   )

(:action find_victim ; identify the first victim to spy on
      :parameters (?p - player ?v - victim ?sg - spy_group)
      :precondition (and (in ?p ?sg) (not (has_victim ?sg ?v)))
      :effect (and (has_victim ?sg ?v))
   )
spy:
(:action spy_group_is_ready ; check that all prerequisites of the spy group are complete
      :parameters (?p - player ?sg - spy_group) 
      :precondition (and (not (group_is_ready ?sg)) (has_private_place ?sg) (has_gear ?sg camera) (has_equipment ?sg binoculars) (has_victim ?sg victim1))
      :effect (and (group_is_ready ?sg))
   )
```

In these actions:
- `set_spy_group` sets up the spy group with the player and a co-conspirator.
- `talk_in_private` establishes a private place for the spy group to hold meetings and talk.
- `gather_gear` and `gather_equipment` gather essential gear and equipment for the spy group.
- `find_victim` identifies the first victim the spy group will be spying on.
- `spy_group_is_ready` checks that all prerequisites for the spy group are complete.
